docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: It has been well documented that the elderly, particularly those 75 and older, are rapidly increasing and are presenting new challenges to the health-care system in this country. Their health-care needs are changing from primarily acute care to increasingly chronic care. This is accompanied by the need for in-home services, such as home aides, shopping and housekeeping, as well as residential and nursing-home care for those suffering more extensive impairments.
